name: Flowspace
headline: The operating system powering ecommerce fulfillment
description: Flowspace couples powerful software with its national fulfillment network to enable brands to offer consistently fast, efficient delivery from every channel. Integrated within a network of +130 fulfillment locations nationwide, OmniFlow software offers an ecommerce command center for brand operators, empowering them with the visibility and insights needed to control operations and drive success.

![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/hero_new_dashboard_3.jpg)
#### **Helping Brands**
# **ACT BIG, STAY SMALL**
Flowspace is the outsourced fulfillment solution for fast-growing CPG brands. Let us handle the logistics so you can focus on growing your brand.
We help brands:
  * **Sell Your Products in More Places:** Easily connect to Shopify, Amazon, TikTok, and retail channels with our fast and easy-to-use software. 
  * **Boost Your Profits:** Leverage our team of experts and use real-time data to identify cost-savings and automate tasks to save you time.
  * **Wow Your Customers:** Deliver faster, customize your packaging and quickly respond to customers to elevate your brand.


[Get Started](http://www.flow.space/</schedule-a-demo/>)[Learn More](http://www.flow.space/</fulfillment/>)
![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/stats_pick.png) ![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/stats_shipping_rate.png) ![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/stats_trustpilot.png)
## Flowspace Streamlines Your Fulfillment Operations
![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/flowspace-solutions.jpg)
## Network Optimization
With a distributed network of hundreds of fulfillment centers, connected by software, Flowspace will determine where to fulfill products closest to your customers, enabling you to offer consistently fast, efficient delivery from every channel.
  * **Speed up shipping times** and enable 2 day shipping
  * **Optimize inventory on hand** based on historic sales data
  * **Lower transportation costs** and reduce carbon footprint


[Learn More](http://www.flow.space/</technology/network-optimization/>)
## Fulfill and Deliver My Orders
Flowspace is trusted by hundreds of brands nationwide to fulfill and deliver their orders with its network of +150 warehouses nationwide. Our team on the ground serves as your logistics team to proactively make sure your orders are always processed as efficiently as possible. The Flowspace difference is both our software and the level of attention we provide through our award winning customer service.
[Learn More](http://www.flow.space/</fulfillment/>)
#### Order Fulfillment
Pick, pack, and ship your orders. Rate shop to get the best shipping.
#### Retail Fulfillment
Connect to retailers for automated EDI wholesale and retail fulfillment.
#### FDA and GSFI Certified
Comprehensive refrigerated network to meet the needs of brands requiring temp control.
#### Custom Packaging
Branded boxes, mail inserts, kitting, and gift messages.
#### 2-Day Delivery
Flowspace helps merchants optimize be competitive in getting orders to customers fast.
#### Integrations
Flowspace integrates with the leading shopping carts, marketplaces, or retail stores.
#### Warehouse Management
Manage inventory in Amazon and Flowspace warehouses through a single platform.
#### Shipment Tracking
Track and manage shipments after orders leave the warehouse.
## Inventory Management
Get real-time insights and demand forecasting recommendations to help you make smarter inventory management and allocation decisions.
  * **Optimize stock levels** based on customer demand
  * **Avoid out-of-stocks** with actionable inventory data
  * **Inventory tracking and visibility** that enables you to meet customer service level expectations

[Learn More](http://www.flow.space/</technology/inventory-flow/>)
## Unlock Insights with FlowspaceAI
Flowspace brings best-in-class software to all of its customers giving the tools they need to grow while saving time and money.
  * **Strategic inventory planning** using your historic data
  * **Intelligent workflow automation** of mundane tasks
  * **Real-time data visibility** answers fulfillment questions in seconds

[Learn More](http://www.flow.space/</technology/flowspaceai/>)
![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/integration-logos.png)
## **Connect Your Partners to Flowspace**
Flowspace is integrated with the leading ecommerce shopping carts, marketplaces, and retail stores
[Learn More](http://www.flow.space/</integrations/>)
> Flowspace is the main contributor to our growth. If we are not able to fulfill orders, we are not able fulfill our promise to our customers. A big thank you to Flowspace.
Daniel Hernández, North America Team Lead
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/emma-mattress/>)
> **Flowspace is our partner in omnichannel growth. It’s easy and efficient to manage orders and inventory for all channels, with visibility and and fulfillment operations centralized in one place.**
Hector Omoigui, Senior Operations Manager, Reel Paper
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/reel-paper/>)
> Flowspace has been an invaluable partner as the brand expands. Not only have we been able to drive down costs, they also ensure we deliver on our commitment to an excellent experience for our loyal customers.
Vincent Bradley, CEO of Proper Wild
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/proper-wild-cost-reduction/>)
> #### Flowspace has provided us with more time to focus on growing the business. With the time saved, we’ve added new products to the product line.
Saba Karadsheh, President and Founder, The Mediterranean Dish, LLC
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/the-mediterranean-dish/>)
> ##### The biggest benefit of working with Flowspace is the ability to diversify sales channels without adjusting our inventory practices.
Nick Newlin, Vice President
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/rukket-enters-retail/>)
> The Flowspace network has enabled us to get orders to our customers around the country quickly and affordably. They provide a level of service that is unmatched in the industry.
Mike Gilberg, Logistics Manager, Lifeaid
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/lifeaid/>)
> #### Flowspace has allowed us to scale and grow extremely seamlessly. We spend the least amount of time worrying about fulfillment and warehousing than ever before.
Nisha Phatak, Cofounder, Lion Pose
[Read Success Story](http://www.flow.space/<https:/flow.space/success-stories/lion-pose/>)
## Our Awards
![](https://flow.space/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/NewAwards-1.png)
[View More Awards](http://www.flow.space/</industry-awards-and-recognitions/>)

generated_description:
**Flowspace: The E-commerce Fulfillment Powerhouse**

At its core, Flowspace is about making e-commerce fulfillment easier and more efficient. Founded in 2017 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s Batch S17, Flowspace integrates powerful software with a robust national fulfillment network, comprising over 130 locations across the USA. This setup allows brands to provide quick and seamless delivery, no matter where their customers are.

**Mission and Technology**

Flowspace aims to be the operating system powering e-commerce fulfillment. Its OmniFlow software acts as an e-commerce command center, giving brand operators a bird’s-eye view of their operations. With real-time insights and transparency in logistics, it helps businesses optimize their fulfillment processes. Think of it as a control panel that puts the brand in the driver’s seat.

The tech behind Flowspace isn’t just about moving packages. It’s about transforming the entire fulfillment experience. They offer features like network optimization, inventory management, and integration with major platforms such as Shopify and Amazon—all designed to help brands sell more, spend less, and delight customers.

**Who They Serve**

Flowspace caters primarily to fast-growing consumer packaged goods (CPG) brands. Their clientele spans multiple industries, including food and beverage, health and beauty, furniture and home goods, and more. Their aim? To allow companies to "act big, stay small." The premise is simple: by outsourcing logistics, brands can channel their energy into growth without getting bogged down in the complexities of fulfillment.

**Location and Team**

Headquartered in Los Angeles with a team of 48 employees, Flowspace blends tech expertise with logistical know-how. Dalton Caldwell, a notable figure in the venture capital space, serves as their Group Partner. 

**Current Initiatives**

Flowspace is actively engaging with brands looking to improve their fulfillment strategies. They provide resources like FAQs for fulfillment RFPs and offer demos of their technology to prospective clients. Their approach emphasizes asking the right questions to select the best fulfillment partners—because the right fit can make all the difference.

**Conclusion**

In a world where speed and efficiency dictate success, Flowspace stands out as a transformative player in the logistics sector. Brands looking to grow can lean on Flowspace’s infrastructure and technology to fulfill orders swiftly while maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction. As e-commerce continues to evolve, Flowspace is clearly poised to remain at the forefront of fulfillment solutions. Check them out at [Flowspace](http://www.flow.space).
